content: You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. We’ve really focused on go-to-market resources as well as R&D, although I’d say there is growth really across all elements of the business as we scale into the revenue growth that you’ve seen us report the last few quarters. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. I think also, the land-and-expand strategy that we’ve taken that has allowed us to show that we can actually generate incremental revenues from our client relationships across all of our products and in education really gives us a lot of comfort and optimism around what Q3 will look like. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead.
